input.sentences: i went on vacation last weekend .
there were a lot of musicians there .
there were also many street performers .
i bought some of the local produce .
they had some very good food there .
output.sentences: Oh man, I am so glad we're finally here at this coolest vacation place of all!
Check out the cat on the horn!
And what's not to love about street performers?
Who cares about all of that?
